article_title: Higher Prices, Fewer Choices And Impersonal Care

article_metadata.description: Hospital systems are employing more and more physicians and acquiring established medical practices as fast as they can. In fact, the number of physicians leaving independent practice has increased dramatically over the past decade.
article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck

og.description: Hospital systems are employing more and more physicians and acquiring established medical practices as fast as they can. In fact, the number of physicians leaving independent practice has increased dramatically over the past decade.
og.title: Giant Healthcare Systems: Higher Prices, Fewer Choices And Impersonal Care
